CHAT.comment: when the tape starts, the tank has already been uncovered
child points to side of cage.
mom points to middle of cage.
there's a knock somewhere, and the child hears it, so she runs to the other side of the room and mom laughs.
child knocks on the table.
mom leans over tank to look at starfish.
mom points to side of cage.
child points to side of cage.
mom points to opposite side of cage.
child points to something in the cage.
child starts to walk away from the tank.
child points to live things in tank and starts counting.
mom and child talk simultaneously.
child points to each of the rocks as she talks about the houses.
mom points to object in corner of cage.
child points to other side of cage.
child points again.
child walks over to couch.
child returns to tank.
child is referring to object in corner of cage.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child points to something in middle of cage.
INV opens the door and watches.
INV covers tank.
INV enters room with Robodog.
child gets onto the floor and talks to robodog.
when robodog stops moving, child automatically reaches for button and pushes it.
robodog goes to sit and mom laughs.
child presses button again.
mom moves robodog over towards her and points to its chest.
robodog walks away from child, but she grabs it and brings it back.
mom picks robodog up and looks on its underside.
INV takes robodog from room
INV enters room with degu.
INV leaves room.
mom and child move over to table.
mom holds finger near degu and talks to it.
degu makes sudden movement and mom and child laugh.
degu goes to sniff child's finger and touches it.
degu touches child's finger again.
mom laughs.
child puts finger near degu and it touches it again.
mom and child laugh.
child points to bedding in cage.
INV takes degu from room.
mom and child laughs.
INV enters room with meerkat.
child drops meerkat onto floor.
child slides meerkat down couch.
child repeatedly slides meerkat down couch.
child gives meerkat to mom and she looks at label to see if she can find out what it is.
mom slides meerkat off of couch and then child takes it back again.
child drops meerkat off of couch head first.
child walks meerkat over to table.
child acts as if meerkat is drinking and makes gulping noises.
child makes more drinking noises.
child makes eating and drinking noises while moving meerkat between chairs.
child places meerkat on green chair.
child moves towards computer box.
child acts as if meerkat dives into blue chair.
child puts meerkat under other blue chair.
child brings meerkat over to blue chair.
child goes over to other blue chair and pretends to drink and makes slurping noises.
mom pretends to drink.
child pretends to pull grass off of chair.
mom pretends to eat food.
child takes meerkat and has it eat off of the chair and then wags its tail.
INV takes meerkat out of room.
INV gives toy car to child.
mom and child sit on floor with toy car.
child makes unintelligible noise while trying to pull car out from under couch.
child goes under table with car.
mom rolls car around.
child pushes car with her head.
child pushes car under table.
mom laughs.
child crawls under table.
child pushes car to mom.
child demonstrates, but cannot be seen.
mom pretends to hand can to child.
child pretends to get oil from underneath fish tank.
child pushes car quickly across carpet.
child crawls under table.
child pushes car to mom.
mom pushes car back to child.
child demonstrates out of view of camera and then pushes car back to mom.
child pushes car to mom and it flips over.
mom is referring to hood that opened when car flipped over.
child brings car over to table.
child puts car under table.
child crawls under table.
INV puts toy car outside of room.
INV and child uncover computer box
mom and child play with computer box for a while before speaking.
child tries very hard to push on computer box and then sighs.
mom taps on computer box for a while.
mom and child both touch computer box and it makes noise.
child plays with computer box for a bit and then looks at mom.
mom presses sensor on computer box.
child pushes mom's hand away from computer box.
mom tries to touch it again but child pushes her hand away but mom laughs.
mom laughs and kisses child on arm.
mom takes child's hand and tries to touch it, but child refuses.
child shakes her head no after computer box makes noise.
child is trying to make computer box make certain noise and it's not making it.
child touches middle sensor and computer box makes noise.
child pushes mom's hand away.
child demonstrates how she got computer box to make that noise.
mom tries to touch computer box but child pushes her hand away.
child hits computer box.
mom touches computer box.
INV covers computer box.
